title: Production Home Occupancy & Presence Analytics Dashboard

targets.query: from(bucket: "ha_events") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /ha_/) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] == "device_tracker") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["state"] == "home") |> count() |> yield(name: "People Home")

from(bucket: "ha_events") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /ha_/) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] == "device_tracker") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state") |> group(columns: ["entity_id", "state"]) |> count() |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true) |> yield(name: "Location Status")

from(bucket: "ha_events") |> range(start: -7d) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /ha_/) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] == "device_tracker") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state") |> filter(fn: (r) => r["state"] == "home") |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: count, createEmpty: false) |> yield(name: "Hourly Occupancy")

from(bucket: "ha_events") |> range(start: -24h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /ha_/) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] =~ /(binary_sensor|sensor)/) |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] =~ /.*(motion|door|window|security).*/) |> aggregateWindow(every: 15m, fn: count, createEmpty: false) |> yield(name: "Security Events")
